languages.text: {n}Грохот вышибаемых дверей и вопли заполняют помещение. В воздухе повисает кислый запах сгоревшего фузелина. Хладные торговцы замирают, внимательно рассматривая направленные на них стволы.{/n}

{n}The crashing sounds of doors being kicked in and screams fill the room. The sharp tang of burning fyceline hangs in the air. The Cold Traders freeze, giving the barrels pointed at them their full attention.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Грохот вышибаемых дверей и вопли заполняют помещение. В воздухе повисает кислый запах сгоревшего фузелина. Хладные торговцы замирают, внимательно рассматривая направленные на них стволы.{/n}

{n}The crashing sounds of doors being kicked in and screams fill the room. The sharp tang of burning fyceline hangs in the air. The Cold Traders freeze, giving the barrels pointed at them their full attention.{/n}

languages.text: {n}突然之间，踢门的声音与尖叫声充满了整个房间，空气中弥漫着子弹出膛的硝烟味。冷市商人们愣在了原地，所有注意力都被直指着他们的枪管吸引住了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crashing sounds of doors being kicked in and screams fill the room. The sharp tang of burning fyceline hangs in the air. The Cold Traders freeze, giving the barrels pointed at them their full attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，踢门的声音与尖叫声充满了整个房间，空气中弥漫着子弹出膛的硝烟味。冷市商人们愣在了原地，所有注意力都被直指着他们的枪管吸引住了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ドアを蹴破る音と悲鳴が部屋を満たす。燃えさかるファイセリン燃料の鋭い匂いが漂う。コールド・トレーダーたちは凍りつき、自分たちに向けられた銃口に全神経を集中させる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crashing sounds of doors being kicked in and screams fill the room. The sharp tang of burning fyceline hangs in the air. The Cold Traders freeze, giving the barrels pointed at them their full attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ドアを蹴破る音と悲鳴が部屋を満たす。燃えさかるファイセリン燃料の鋭い匂いが漂う。コールド・トレーダーたちは凍りつき、自分たちに向けられた銃口に全神経を集中させる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El estruendo de puertas derribadas y gritos llena la sala. El penetrante olor de la fycelina ardiente impregna el aire. Los Comerciantes Fríos no mueven ni un músculo, dedicando toda su atención a los cañones que les apuntan.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crashing sounds of doors being kicked in and screams fill the room. The sharp tang of burning fyceline hangs in the air. The Cold Traders freeze, giving the barrels pointed at them their full attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El estruendo de puertas derribadas y gritos llena la sala. El penetrante olor de la fycelina ardiente impregna el aire. Los Comerciantes Fríos no mueven ni un músculo, dedicando toda su atención a los cañones que les apuntan.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soudain, le calme de la pièce est interrompu par le bruit de portes qu'on enfonce et des cris. Une forte odeur de fyceline brûlée flotte dans l'air. Les marchands se figent, portant toute leur attention sur les canons braqués sur eux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crashing sounds of doors being kicked in and screams fill the room. The sharp tang of burning fyceline hangs in the air. The Cold Traders freeze, giving the barrels pointed at them their full attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, le calme de la pièce est interrompu par le bruit de portes qu'on enfonce et des cris. Une forte odeur de fyceline brûlée flotte dans l'air. Les marchands se figent, portant toute leur attention sur les canons braqués sur eux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Krach eingetretener Türen und Schreie erfüllen den Raum. Der beißende Geruch von brennendem Fycelin hängt in der Luft. Die Kalthändler erstarren, als sie realisieren, wie viele Läufe auf sie gerichtet sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crashing sounds of doors being kicked in and screams fill the room. The sharp tang of burning fyceline hangs in the air. The Cold Traders freeze, giving the barrels pointed at them their full attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Krach eingetretener Türen und Schreie erfüllen den Raum. Der beißende Geruch von brennendem Fycelin hängt in der Luft. Die Kalthändler erstarren, als sie realisieren, wie viele Läufe auf sie gerichtet sind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Odayı tekmelenen kapıların kırılma sesleri ve çığlıklar dolduruyor. Havada, yanan fizelinin keskin tadı asılı kalıyor. Onlara doğrultulmuş namluları pürdikkat izleyen Soğuk Tacirler yerlerinden kıpırdamıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crashing sounds of doors being kicked in and screams fill the room. The sharp tang of burning fyceline hangs in the air. The Cold Traders freeze, giving the barrels pointed at them their full attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Odayı tekmelenen kapıların kırılma sesleri ve çığlıklar dolduruyor. Havada, yanan fizelinin keskin tadı asılı kalıyor. Onlara doğrultulmuş namluları pürdikkat izleyen Soğuk Tacirler yerlerinden kıpırdamıyor.{/n}
